tool_description: Provide a service for querying Amazon review information, supporting global sites and including complete details of reviews such as title, content, star rating, images, videos, etc. It is capable of querying more than 100 records (surpassing the official default query limit) with high stability and low latency.
name: Amazon Reviews Data
title: Amazon Reviews Data

api_list.name: Get Product Reviews
api_list.description: Get and paginate through all product reviews on Amazon. Each page contains up to 10 reviews.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description:
- Default: us
- Allowed values: us, au, br, ca, cn, fr, de, in, it, mx, nl, sg, es, tr, ae, gb, jp, sa, pl, se, be, eg

optional_parameters.name: includeVariants
optional_parameters.description: Whether it includes review information for all variants associated with the ASIN. The default values is true.

optional_parameters.name: pageNo
optional_parameters.description: Result pages to return. The default values is 1.
